Txt_Talk_ShallowShrine_B1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text:
No reply.
It's just a corpse.

Txt_Talk_ShallowShrine_B1F_SUB_0_VOLUME_.Text: *: I am he to whom were entrusted the tales of the ancient times.
*: South of the desert kingdom of Ibis, past the mountains and amidst the blighted Necrogond, there gapeth an abyss... The great Pit of Giaga...
*: 'Tis a festering wound in the earth... The wellspring of all woe in this world... All pestilence... All evil...

Txt_Talk_ShallowShrine_Out_MAIN_0_SCENE_.Text: There's something barely visible deep down beneath the waves...
{LEADER} lowers the bottomless pot into the water.
